description: This is a market on whether Pyschonauts 2 will score at least 87 on Metacritic at 12 PM ET one week after the official release date listed on metacritic.com. The resolution source is https://www.metacritic.com/game/pc/psychonauts-2, where the metascore is the whole number presented. Should this URL change or move locations, the MIC will use its best judgement to pick a new URL on the metacritic domain. Should the Metacritic score be unavailable at 12:00 PM ET one week after the release date, the resolution source will be checked daily at 12:00 PM ET for one additional week. If the resolution source is still unavailable or if no metascore is present, this market will resolve to “No.” Should the release date not be present on the site, the release date listed on the steam page listed here will be used: https://store.steampowered.com/app/607080/Psychonauts_2/. Any changes to the original Psychonauts score will not be considered; only 87 will be used. Should the game be delayed, the new release date will be used. Should the game still not be released by September 30th, 2021, 12 PM ET, this market will resolve to “No.” In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).

events.title: Will Psychonauts 2 get a better or equal 'Metascore' to Psychonauts 1 (87/100) 1 week after release?

question: Will Psychonauts 2 get a better or equal 'Metascore' to Psychonauts 1 (87/100) 1 week after release?
